title: How to use an app to split screen on Android - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s quite easy. What you only have to do is press the hamburger menu(3 horizontal lines) icon on your phone’s screen. You will see all the apps that are running in the background. At the upper right corner, you will see the option for “Split Screen”. Press on it and then it will ask you to hold and drag the apps you want for your split-screen. You will be allowed to select up to two apps for that. And that’s it. You are good to go. Note:- This answer is based on a mi phone however the process is more or less similar in every other android phone.

From your Home screen, tap on the Recent Apps button in the bottom left corner, which is represented by three vertical lines in a square shape. ... In Recent Apps, locate the app you want to use in split screen. ... Once the menu has opened, tap on "Open in split screen view."
